summary: This is an email correspondence dated July 30, 2019, containing a brief update on two inmates, including Jeffrey Epstein, regarding their psychological observations and court appearances. It notes Epstein's planned court date and his psychological state.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: He is identified as inmate #76318-054 and is the subject of a psychological observation follow-up. The document states he said he is going to court on Wednesday.

events.title: Epstein's Court Appearance
events.description: The document notes that inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) said he is going to court on Wednesday, which would be the day after the email date (Tuesday, July 30, 2019).

keyFacts: The document is an email dated July 30, 2019, providing an update on inmate Jeffrey Epstein.
Epstein was identified by inmate number #76318-054 and was under psychological observation.
Epstein stated he had a court appearance scheduled for the following day, Wednesday, July 31, 2019.
The document references another inmate (#76325-054) showing signs of depression, anxiety, and possible auditory/visual hallucinations.
